messages.subject: moving-new e-mail address
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry for the bulk mailing. We re moving to Kurume on the 20th, so you can write me at this address until Saturday.  My permanent e-mail address is
messages.messageBody:
Sorry for the bulk mailing.

We're moving to Kurume on the 20th, so you can write me at this address
until Saturday. My permanent e-mail address is
melanieshimokawa@... , but it's a web-based account (I prefer
POP3), so we will be getting a new account when we move. (Probably
Nifty-Serve again.) NEwayz, if you want to write to me between Sunday
and the day we get our new address, please write me at my permanent
e-mail address.

Thank you.

Love, Melanie
AOL IM: Vouget
(You can download AOL IM free from http://www.netscape.com . If you see
me online, please say hello!)
